history.title: Do you really want to delete this configuration?
history.content: This configuration will be permanently deleted. You wont be able to restore it.

tablerow.title: Do you want to delete this Bot?
tablerow.content: This Bot will be deleted from the Bot Status. You can still clone and edit it in the History.
tablerow.titleOn: You can't delete a running Bot
tablerow.contentOn: It is not possible to delete a Bot which is currently running. If you want to delete this Bot, you have to turn it off first.
